name: The Bell
title: Rebellious Guardian: The Bell
desc: There once was a traitor who brandished a blade against his fallen clan.\nThough this individual was eventually cast out from his clan, rumor has that his organization continued their chosen duties.\nLegend claims that even the Wolf Pup Rostam might have been involved...
in_play_description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
After the character uses a skill: Gives 1 Shield point to your active character. (Once per Round, stacks up to 2 points)
